backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining a placeholder backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short human-written summaries for key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme file defining OKLCH color tokens and dark-mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component showing the landing page and envelope, switching to the birthday letter on click.
frontend/src/components/BirthdayLetter.t: Component rendering the styled birthday letter with decorative hearts and animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-themed Tailwind CSS with custom colors, backgrounds, animations, and letter/envelope styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and extended styles for the romantic design system.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, issues, and image needs for a romantic single‑purpose web page.
